A medium-sized and rather functional laboratory is set up, with a central marble table as the main feature. Nearby, a row of cold lockers is designed to store specimens for later use, and a tray of very clean tools is set up near the table.

node.name: Cold Laboratory, Work Station
node.description: The air is quite chilly, cold enough to leave ice crystals with every breath. A medium-sized and rather functional laboratory is set up, with a central marble table as the main feature. Nearby, a row of cold lockers is designed to store specimens for later use, and a tray of very clean tools is set up near the table.

node.name: Wyvern Mountain, Narrow Track
node.description: The nearby cliff face juts out into the passageway, making traversing the treacherous mountain trail difficult. A thin coat of dark amber slime weeps down the surface of the rough shale stone, the foul stench emanating from it divulges that the source of the substance was a young wyvern's gut. Lumpy pellets comprised of the compacted and desiccated remains of small animals litter the area.

node.name: Wyvern Mountain, Narrow Track
node.description: A small murder of crows crowd around a recently abandoned wyvern nest tucked into a rocky alcove above. Their excited calls dissolve into loud screeching any time one of their number finds a particularly juicy remnant clinging to the bits of wyvern eggshells left behind.

node.name: Wyvern Mountain, Narrow Track
node.description: Laden with moisture from the nearby Wyvern Falls, a low and husky fog loiters about the dolomite walls like an unwelcome guest. A trifling little stream dribbles down a crease in the rockface, the distinct plopping sound of the water drops are barely audible above the murmur of the distant rapids. Here, some crafty wyvern mothers appear to have taken advantage of the fog to help conceal their nesting sites.

node.name: Wyvern Mountain, Narrow Track
node.description: High overhead, a particularly resilient morning glory vine bridges the gap between two opposing rockfaces. The air is heavy with humidity, though the sweet aroma of the nearby flowers adds a bit of pleasantness to the breeze. Debris from a trio of demolished wyvern nests sprawls across the space, the fragments of eggshells are trampled under any traveler's step.

node.name: Wyvern Mountain, Narrow Track
node.description: The path opens up to a small clearing amongst the rocky cliffs of Wyvern Mountain, a gentle mist from the nearby waterfalls drifting through the area. The lower half of a freshly hatched wyvern lies tucked against the coarse limestone wall, though whether it was bifurcated by an adventurer or its fellow wyverns remains unclear.

node.name: Wyvern Mountain, Narrow Track
node.description: Pale deposits of calcium and other minerals draw chalky horizontal lines down the mountain's craggy face. A trickling of water meanders along the center of the ravine, although the gulch is littered with evidence the water level was once much higher. Footprints in the loamy dirt along the stream's path establish this as a favorite drinking place for young wyverns.

node.name: The Black Spire, Intercessor Training
node.description: Thick training mats cover the entire floor, with indentations along them the size of feet and occasionally bodies. Two pairs of gaethzen spheres light the room, and each has a disjointed white circular disc bisected along the diagonal placed upon the grey stone wall between them.

node.name: The Black Spire, Intercessor Training
node.description: A shallow, circular pit filled with dirt and sand is the most prominent feature of this segment of the training rooms. Small piles of wooden training weapons are stacked neatly on one side of the makeshift arena. Two pairs of gaethzen spheres light the room, and each has a disjointed white circular disc bisected along the diagonal placed upon the grey stone wall between them.

node.name: Wyvern Mountain, Ridgeline Valley
node.description: A sudden drop in the path's elevation parallels a large depression in the ridgeline of Wyvern Mountain. Something wet and organic blankets the sloping path, evidenced by the squishy sound produced with each step upon its surface. Occasionally, drops of water can be heard plinking down upon the stone as gravity urges them downward.

A sudden drop in the path's elevation parallels a large depression in the ridgeline of Wyvern Mountain. Verdant moss blankets the sloping path, every step upon its surface releasing a wet, squishy sound. Drops of water can be seen trailing down amongst the muck and moss as gravity urges them downward.

node.name: Wyvern Mountain, Ridgeline Valley
node.description: The pungent odor of decay permeates the area, intensified by the dark, stagnant air. Fetid goo cakes the base of a skeleton whose bones are tangled with tattered straps of leather.

The pungent odor of decay permeates the area, seemingly intensified by the humid environment. Wyvern tracks mark the fetid goo caked at the base of the skeleton of a pack mule. Tattered remnants of the yoke and tack once used to hitch the creature to a wagon are tangled amongst its frayed bones.

node.name: Wyvern Mountain, Ridgeline Valley
node.description: Shrill calls pierce the darkness as adolescent wyverns circle menacingly above. Concealed by a low fog that snakes its way along the trail, holes dot the landscape, threatening to turn the unwary traveler into easy prey for the wyverns that claim this as their territory.

Deep calls reverberate through the area as adolescent wyverns stake their claims amongst the mountain's bluffs. The short brush along the trail shows evidence of being plundered for nest building materials, and holes dot the landscape where plants have been uprooted and carried off entirely. Despite the ransacking of the developed vegetation, new sprouts persistently emerge from the soil.

node.name: Wyvern Mountain, Ridgeline Valley
node.description: Isolated from its neighbors, a boulder looms forebodingly over the path like an ancient tombstone. Two reptilian skeletons guard its base, their indistinct forms appearing to coalesce into that of a hydra in the darkness.

Isolated from its neighbors, a weathered boulder looms forebodingly over the path like an ancient tombstone. Two adolescent wyvern skeletons rest at its base, frozen in the throes of combat. Though their bones appear to have been here for some time, their brutal claws and teeth remain lodged in the scaly hides of one another.

node.name: Wyvern Mountain, Ridgeline Valley
node.description: Rugged boulders form hulking silhouettes against the night sky. Occasionally, the breeze creates a rasping noise as it briefly reanimates swathes of scaly skin caught on nearby brambles.

The dolomite boulders flanking the wide path have taken on an unusually glossy texture, their surfaces polished smooth where the maturing wyverns have rubbed against them. Translucent swathes of scaly skin festoon the brambles lining the trail.

node.name: Sheltered Valley, Streambed
node.description: A break in the forest provides a view of sharp valley cliffs stretching upward on either side of a swiftly moving streambed. A path leads further up the valley.

A sudden break in the thick pine forest provides a breathtaking view from the bottom of the valley. Sharp crags on either side of the valley are lined with steppe scrub -- wildflower and hardy grass thinning as the elevation and incline rises. Fed from snowmelt in the distance, a clear stream winds down, burbling around smooth stones. A path leads further up the valley.

node.name: Sheltered Valley, Streambed
node.description: The water curves with a gentle bend, and a length of fallen tree emerges from the banks. To the north, a small clearing looks somehow out of place, flickering slightly as if you had blinked for a moment.

Curving around a gentle bend, the water cuts an arc along the bank, depositing sand and dried chaparral from upstream. A length of fallen tree, stripped of branches, emerges from the sand, inviting the weary traveler to sit and reflect. To the north, a small clearing looks somehow out of place, the foliage orderly and the rocks lining the riverbank forming a clear dividing line between the steppe and the waters. The clearing slightly flickers, as though you blinked a moment.

node.name: Sheltered Valley, Small Clearing
node.description: The natural setting here is strangely ordered, the clearing stretching outward in an oddly flat and lush field. A stream demarks the eastern border, and an almost exact line separates the uneven and rough terrain to the south. Wildflowers grow here, and the stream flows smoothly.

While no sign of civilization is evident, the natural setting is strangely ordered. The clearing stretches outward in an oddly flat and lush, almost landscaped field, the stream demarking the eastern border and an almost exact line separating uneven and rough terrain to the south. Pristine wildflowers grow here, explosions of color gently waving in the persistent breeze, cutting the cool air with a subtle sweetness. The stream flows smoothly, so utterly without turbulence it appears motionless.

node.name: Sheltered Valley, Small Clearing
node.description: Wound in ivy and moss, a short, wide cairn marks the corner of the clearing, the grass hugging the lower stones. Thirteen spent candles are placed randomly around the surface of the rockpile, melted wax hardened between the cracks of the stone, burnt wicks cold and black. A pall of disquiet grips the area, and despite the breeze, everything is strangely silent.

Wound in ivy and moss, a short, wide cairn marks the corner of the clearing, the grass hugging the lower stones. The scent of sage and lavender wafts around you, and thirteen spent candles are placed randomly around the surface of the rockpile, melted wax hardened between the cracks of the stone, burnt wicks cold and black. A pall of disquiet grips the area, and despite the breeze, everything is strangely silent.

node.name: Sheltered Valley, Small Clearing
node.description: Neatly ordered, a series of tilled rectangular plots expose rich loamy soil cut from the green brush and wildflowers. Though the plots fill the area with a richly aromatic scent of damp earth, no weed or vine grows within their borders.

Neatly ordered, a series of tilled rectangular plots expose rich loamy soil cut from the green brush and wildflowers. A few old posts stand in the corners of some of the plots, and discarded fence boards lay scattered, splintering against time and the elements. Though the plots fill the area with a richly aromatic scent of damp earth, no weed or vine grows within their borders.

node.name: Sheltered Valley, Small Clearing
node.description: The beginnings of a gravel path start here and dissipate into a few scattered pebbles to the north after a few feet, the clearing surrendering to the steppe and broken, uneven ground and scattered scrub. The scent of sage and lavender wafts from the southwest, a vague shimmer in the direction of the cairn. To the east, the brook widens to a nearly circular pool.

The beginnings of a gravel path start here and dissipate into a few scattered pebbles to the north after a few feet, the clearing surrendering to the steppe and broken, uneven ground and scattered scrub. The scent of sage and lavender wafts from the southwest, a vague shimmer in the direction of the cairn. To the east, the brook widens to a nearly circular pool, deep and smooth, lined with broad flat, bench-like boulders. Large red and yellow carp patrol the pool, and a single gap in the embankment allows drainage downstream.

node.name: Sheltered Valley, Strange Clearing
node.description: Almost buried completely in ivy and moss, a short, wide cairn marks the corner of the clearing, the grass providing wide berth around the lower stones. Smoke wafts from within the cairn, carrying the scent of sage and lavender, and thirteen unflickering lit candles, placed randomly around the surface of the rockpile, remain unconsumed as they burn.

Almost buried completely in ivy and moss, a short, wide cairn marks the corner of the clearing, the grass providing wide berth around the lower stones. Smoke wafts from within the cairn, carrying the scent of sage and lavender, and thirteen unflickering lit candles, placed randomly around the surface of the rockpile, remain unconsumed as they burn. Gentle whispers can be heard along the winds, though you cannot identify their source.

node.name: Sheltered Valley, Strange Clearing
node.description: The natural setting is extremely ordered. The clearing stretches outward in an oddly flat and lush, perfectly square, landscaped field. The stream demarks the eastern border, and an almost exact line separates uneven and rough terrain to the south. The stream flows smoothly, periodically stopping entirely as droplets briefly hang a few feet above the surface before gently raining back down like a brief spring shower.

While no sign of civilization is evident, the natural setting is extremely ordered. The clearing stretches outward in an oddly flat and lush, perfectly square, landscaped field. The stream demarks the eastern border, and an almost exact line separates uneven and rough terrain to the south. Pristine wildflowers grow here, explosions of color gently waving in the persistent breeze, cutting the cool air with a subtle sweetness. The stream flows smoothly, periodically stopping entirely as droplets briefly hang a few feet above the surface before gently raining back down like a brief spring shower.

node.name: Sheltered Valley, Strange Clearing
node.description: Seated on a broad foundation of rough, flat, stone, a thick timbered, modest farmhouse with wide windows sits at the end of a short gravel path, while the scent of sage and lavender comes from the southwest, a vague shimmer in the direction of the cairn. The scent of fresh baked bread fills the air, and to the east, the brook widens to a circular pool, deep and smooth, lined with broad bench-like boulders, softly steaming with the heat of underground hotsprings.

Seated on a broad foundation of rough, flat, stone, a thick timbered, modest farmhouse with wide windows sits at the end of a short gravel path, while the scent of sage and lavender comes from the southwest, a vague shimmer in the direction of the cairn. A stone chimney rises from the western wall, thin plumes of smoke gently wafting in the breeze. Drying herbs hang under the covered porch, and near the door, a waterskin hangs from a nail next to a simple bench. The scent of fresh baked bread fills the air, and to the east, the brook widens to a circular pool, deep and smooth, lined with broad bench-like boulders, softly steaming with the heat of underground hotsprings.

node.name: Sheltered Valley, Strange Clearing
node.description: Neatly ordered, a series of tilled rectangular plots expose rich loamy soil arranged into perfect rows bearing lush rosettes sprouting at regularly spaced intervals. A pair of watering cans lean against one of the fenceposts, and the breeze bears the scent of damp soil and root vegetables.

Neatly ordered, a series of tilled rectangular plots expose rich loamy soil arranged into perfect rows bearing lush rosettes sprouting at regularly spaced intervals. A low wooden fence separates the plots from the wildlands, too low to serve any purpose other than adornment. A pair of watering cans lean against one of the fenceposts, and the breeze bears the scent of damp soil and root vegetables.

node.name: Sheltered Valley, Farmstead
node.description: The tight joinery of the farm's walls has been tastefully covered by hanging tapestries bearing simple geometric patterns and celestial symbols, pressings of leaves and preserved insects, and just a few too many carefully nurtured potted plants. A brass telescope next to the northern window, and a stack of fresh paper and charcoal sticks resting on a writing desk next to the southern window. At the center of the room on a thick wooden table rests a basket of thick bread.

The tight joinery of the farm's walls has been tastefully covered by hanging tapestries bearing simple geometric patterns and celestial symbols, pressings of leaves and preserved insects, and just a few too many carefully nurtured potted plants. A wide hearth crackles merrily, warming the space against the chill of the steppe, and gaethzen lamps illuminate the corners and rafters. Broad open windows provide a full view of the mountains and surroundings, and a few simple rocking chairs face different windows, a brass telescope next to the northern window, and a stack of fresh paper and charcoal sticks resting on a writing desk next to the southern window. At the center of the room on a thick wooden table rests a basket of thick bread. Books are scattered throughout the cabin, although there is no bookshelf.

node.name: Sheltered Valley, Farmstead
node.description: The eastern wall of the farm is largely open, affording an expansive view of the steppe and hot springs. A simple workbench and counter stands next to a modest ice chest and wide basin. Atop the workbench, bars of soap on wax paper sit next to a basin of clean water and an open box of organized surgical tools. A weatherproofed cabinet displays alchemical tools, holding a small collection of clear and brown jars.

The eastern wall of the farm is largely open, affording an expansive view of the steppe and hot springs. A simple workbench and counter stands next to a modest ice chest and wide basin, sheltered by a wide awning providing shade. Atop the workbench, bars of soap on wax paper sit next to a basin of clean water and an open box of organized surgical tools. A weatherproofed cabinet displays alchemical tools gathering dust in the other corner, holding a small collection of clear and brown jars sealed with soft lead.

node.name: Wyvern Trail, Climbing Path
node.description: Although it barely clings to the side of the cliff in some places, the trail still manages to allow passage up the craggy side of the plateau. Trees sink deep roots into the rocks in an attempt to stay upright.

node.name: Wyvern Trail, Twisted Ledge
node.description: A brief respite from the sheer verticality of the route is provided by a narrow ledge that juts out from the surrounding rocks. A few small shrubs have established themselves in the shadows of the overhanging cliff.

node.name: Wyvern Trail, Narrow Ledge
node.description: Wedged into a crevice, a large flat rock that fell from above now allows for relatively safe passage along the side of the cliff. A random scattering of rocks and debris testifies to possiblity of further falls.

node.name: Wyvern Trail, Narrow Ledge
node.description: Jumbled together in a random grouping, a pile of boulders rests atop a much larger rock jutting out from the bluff. Winding amongst the rocks, a barely visible path allows for passage through the rubble of past landslides.

node.name: Wyvern Trail, Rockslide
node.description: Masses of rock and mud have cascaded down from above, blocking passage further east along the cliffside. Fortunately, a steep trail bypasses the blockage and gives access to the plateau above. Little vegetation survived when the earth slipped but a few small shrubs still cling to the cliff on the edges of the landslide.

node.name: Wyvern Plateau, Narrow Crevice
node.description: Cutting deep into the edge of the plateau, a narrow crevice cleaves downward towards the precipice. Right at the drop-off, a steep trail begins and zigzags down the cliff face towards the forest below.

node.name: Wyvern Plateau, Grassland
node.description: Grassland stretches endlessly out from the plateau's edge, rippling in the wind. Only a very few stumpy trees rise above the vegetation, their branches gnarled by the ever-present breeze.

node.name: Wyvern Plateau, Grassland
node.description: Grassland stretches out from the edges of the plateau, a mass of undulating greenery that effectively hides the rocky soil beneath. Songbirds dart amongst the stems, their melodious voices rising above the susurration of the swaying leaves.

node.name: Wyvern Plateau, Grassland
node.description: Grassland stretches out from the edges of the plateau, with only a few shrubs to break the monotony of the whispering grasses swaying in the wind. Bats swirl in the night, darting out from their cliffside cave homes in search of insects and other prey.

node.name: Wyvern Plateau, Grassland
node.description: Grassand stretches out from the plateau's edge, running right up to the edge of the vertical cliffs. The crumbling edge is festooned with teetering rocks and boulders, poised to crash to the forest below.

node.name: Wyvern Plateau, Grassland
node.description: Grassland stretches out from the edges of the plateau, the thick growth almost hiding a winding trail that snakes towards a small vale cupped within the rocky outcrop.

node.name: Wyvern Plateau, Grassy Vale
node.description: Cupped within the surrounding grassland, a small vale enclosed by low rocky walls stetches around a small spring. Tendrils of water flow out from the spring, feeding two meager rivulets winding amongst the savannah.

node.name: Wyvern Plateau, Grassy Vale
node.description: The meandering streamlet eventually peters out into nothingness, its moisture dispersing amongst the thirsty grasses. A few stray boulders mark the edge of the plateau, providing some warning of the plunge into the surrounding forest lurking below.

node.name: Wyvern Plateau, Grassy Vale
node.description: Ending rather abruptly, the tiny stream drains away into a crevice, disappearing completely into the rocks of the plateau without a trace. Not far from the crevice, the plateau itself ends in a sheer drop off to the forest far, far below.

node.name: Wyvern Plateau, Opening
node.description: Overhead the rocks meet in an arch that extends into a gorge that opens up to the sky. In contrast to the outer trail, the walls are lush with vegetation that grows in the seeping rocks. The accumulated moisture pools on the floor and then disappears into a narrow crack, flowing into some unknown subterreanean passage.

node.name: Wyvern Trail, Grotto
node.description: Glimpses of the sky are visible above, fleeting glances only available when the sheer rocks of the grotto widen enough to allow them. Luxuriant plant life runs riot over the cliffs, sending roots and tendrils deep into the seeping rock faces. Small pools and puddles run along the bottom of the grotto before combining into a small trickle that wends its way towards the grotto's exit.

node.name: Wyvern Trail, Grotto
node.description: A small spring gurgles out of the curving western wall, a thicket of ferns clustered close to its banks. Tiny pawprints lead to and from the pool but are such a confused jumble that it is impossible to determine what creature made them.

node.name: Wyvern Trail, Grotto
node.description: Sheer sandstone walls loom above the thicket of shrubs and low trees that crowd the sodden ground. The verdant leaves and vines drip with moisture with an occasional *plop* as a droplet falls into a puddle being the only sound that resonates in the area.

node.name: Wyvern Trail, Grotto
node.description: Thick tree trunks rise from the damp soil, their bark almost completely covered in deep growths of greenish moss. Vines snake from branch to branch, their lush foliage helping to further obscure vision within the grotto.

node.name: Wyvern Trail, Grotto
node.description: Willow saplings crowd the center of the grotto, sinking their roots into the dirt, crumbled rock, and pools of water that form the ground of the rocky crevice. The dense copse of trees almost completely obscures the sky, but a few game trails wend between the swaying trunks.

node.name: Wyvern Trail, Grotto
node.description: Seeping rock walls meet in a sharp corner where a small pool has formed. It must have an underground outflow, as no stream or even trickle of water exits the muddy banks. Tracks of unknown animals almost completely cover the muddy ground, the sheer numbers of them serving to obscure their owner's identity.

node.name: Wyvern Trail, Hollow
node.description: Sandstone walls open into a small hollow within the larger ravine that runs into the plateau. Tiny rivulets of water trickle down the walls, providing the water necessary to keep alive the lush vegetation that fills the hollow. A few industrious vines have bridged the gap between the walls, their leaves dripping with condensation.

node.name: Wyvern Trail, Hollow
node.description: A small pool has formed at the base of the sandstone walls, its waters gathered from the seepage that drips down from the rocky cliffs and condenses on the leaves of the trees. A lush carpet of ferns covers the damp ground between the tree trunks, and moss cloaks the bark on the trees.

node.name: Wyvern Trail, Hollow
node.description: A dense stand of willows nearly fills this part of the gorge, their dense foliage and leaves threaded throughout with a network of game trails. Tiny pawprints cover the damp ground of the trails, their sheer number making identification almost impossible.

node.name: Shambling Weald, Gap
node.description: Dim light from the passage filters through the foliage, illuminating an opening in the forest that's barely wide enough for a Gor'Tog to pass through. The sounds of animals and insects come from the underbrush, along with other, unidentifiable sounds.

node.name: Shambling Weald, Wildwood
node.description: Raucous calls of birds ring out overhead from the unseen sky. Vines and creepers dangle from the soaring canopy which stretches far above the shrubs and saplings of the forest floor.

node.name: Shambling Weald, Glade
node.description: Standing tall and straight in the forest opening, a mighty durmast stretches skyward, its spreading branches reaching like outstretched arms to the surrounding forest. The opening in the canopy allows for grass to struggle with the ever-present vines and shrubs.

node.name: Shambling Weald, Wildwood
node.description: Growing up over a clump of saplings and shrubs, a particularly exuberant creeper has all but obscured one path through the woods here. Further paths are less overgrown, and show evidence of being used by something, although the tracks are not quite like any animal recorded.

node.name: Shambling Weald, Wildwood
node.description: Fallen leaves lie like forgotten children's toys along the forest trail, tattered and strewn about with the passage of animals. The faint scent of decaying foliage lingers in the air, everpresent beneath the smell of the forest.

node.name: Shambling Weald, Wildwood
node.description: Seeping from the ground, a tiny spring burbles within the forest, its waters making the area more humid while providing a source of moisture for delicate plants. One bank of the pool shows signs that the waters are also used by the forest's denizens as welcome refreshment.

node.name: Shambling Weald, Wildwood
node.description: The game trails that wend their way through the heavy undergrowth come together long enough to split apart again. The rustle of leaves gives evidence of something lurking just beyond sight, but nothing gives any clue as to the unknown creature's identity.

node.name: Shambling Weald, Wildwood
node.description: Falling like a curtain from the canopy, a wall of vines has interwoven itself so tightly that it blocks further passage in some directions. Game trails twist their way through the rest of the trees, joining and parting like a meandering stream.

node.name: Shambling Weald, Durmast Branches
node.description: Broad branches provide a safe place to escape the crowded forest floor with its dangerous creatures and cloying vegetation. Unfortunately, further progress up the tree is blocked by a heavy growth of vines and creepers that has so intermingled that it is like a living wall.

node.name: Shambling Weald, Thicket
node.description: Underbrush crowds up against the taller trees, almost choking out any passage. Forest creatures, however, have left their mark and a few twisting passages allow for travel deeper within the wilderness.

node.name: Shambling Weald, Thicket
node.description: The stench of something rotting suffuses the air, cloying and fetid at the same time. Along with the onmipresent fetor, the trail is swarming with flies and other hovering insects, drawn to the odor like hummingbirds to flowers.

node.name: Shambling Weald, Thicket
node.description: The trail takes a sharp turn at a rocky outcrop that emerges from the surrounding forest, its sides too steep and rocky to allow much vegetation to grow. A few creepers, however, have managed to secure a foothold and have begun their work of insinuating roots into the slabs.

node.name: Shambling Weald, Thicket
node.description: Sheer cliffs rise out of the trees, blocking further passage even more emphatically than the constricting vegetation. Even the most vigorous vines have been unable to secure purchase in the hard rocks, which offer no openings for foot or root.

node.name: The Black Spire, Intercessor Training
node.description: Ropes and cables drape and hang from the ceilings and snake across the area to sturdy bolts sunk into the masonry walls. Thick mats cover the floor, cushioning any falls from the adventurous users of the training equipment. Subdued lighting comes from the gaethzen spheres scattered about the space.

node.name: The Black Spire, Intercessor Training
node.description: Jutting out from the walls are a number of metal bars running parallel to the walls, each set at a different height. The varied elevations allow for easy training by those of differing statures. A bowl of powdered chalk stands off to one side, providing an aid for sweaty grips.

node.name: The Black Spire, Intercessor Training
node.description: Weights are stacked neatly against the walls, standing ready for whoever or whatever next wants to work on the ability to lift heavy masses. Deep gouges on the floor testify to occasional misadventures in the past.

node.name: The Black Spire, Top of Rope
node.description: Dusty cobwebs traverse this corner of the ceiling, which is shrouded in shadows. A rugged bolt anchors a thick hempen rope that dangles down to the floor.
